Acordion.quetion1: Who can join the Embark Creator Program?
Acordion.answer1: All content creators who are dedicated to building something amazing with Embark Studios can apply. To be eligible for the program you must be at least 18 years old and follow the Code of Conduct and Content Guidelines. We also recommend that you create original and unique content (streams, videos or shorts) to increase your chance of being accepted.
Acordion.quetion2: How do I apply to the Embark Creator Program?
Acordion.answer2: You can sign up to our program here. After you submit your application the ECP Team will carefully review it, and if you get approved, we will get back to you via email.
Acordion.quetion3: How long does it take to have my application reviewed?
Acordion.answer3: We are currently accepting members in smaller batches, so response time may vary. If you are not accepted, do not fret! You might be in the future.
Acordion.quetion4: What does Embark Studios look for in my content?
Acordion.answer4:
We are interested in creators that are passionate about our games, actively engage with their audience and produce truly unique content. We also look for qualities such as:- Consistent coverage of ARC Raiders on at least one of your platforms such as: YouTube, Twitch, Instagram and TikTok. - A big, kind personality and amazing skills. - Foster positive and respectful interactions with their communities and fellow creators.
*Meeting this criteria gives you the best chance but it doesn’t guarantee acceptance into the program.
Acordion.quetion5: Do I have to give Embark Studios games only positive feedback if I am an Embark Creator or Partner?
Acordion.answer5: We wish for feedback to be constructive and done in a professional manner. We always strive to make our games better and appreciate honest feedback - positive or negative!
